Section.Catchline: Conversion of specified facilities to children’s behavioral crisis units; not required.

SectionBody.Text: Nothing in s. 394.499 shall be construed to require an existing crisis stabilization unit or juvenile addictions receiving facility to convert to a children’s behavioral crisis unit.

Note.Text: As enacted by s. 2, ch. 2001-191. Section 394.4995 was also enacted by s. 7, ch. 2001-171, and that version references “this act” instead of specifying s. 394.499.
